name: Death Always Lives
description:
You and your squad were wiped out by the enemy soldiers. But they took your dead body and tested on it. Turns out the test was a success and now you are alive again ( and angry )! Its time to take revenge on the fuckers! Run, shoot, explode the enemies in this DOOM/BLOOD inspired game!

The game features:

-AN AWESOME FUCKING SHOTGUN THAT DESTROYS EVERYTHING

-Kick ass music made by me

-Secret weapons out of bounds ( just like the good old times )

-Graphics so bad that the old DOOM looks better than it

-Voice acting done by me and my friend

-A protagonist that was inspired by Caleb from Blood
